title: Nang Pathian hlauhawm tak Lalin ro i rel
lyrics:
Nang, Pathian hlauhawm tak, Lalin ro i rel,
Thlipui i tlangau, kawlphe i khandaih;
Chung lam atangin i zahngaihna entir la,
Aw Lalpa, inremna min pe ang che.

Engkimtithei Pathian, phuba la theitu,
Hmuh lohva vengtu, hriat lohva rorel;
Tunlai hlauhawmnaah min tiboral suh la,
Aw Lalpa, inremna min pe ang che.

Nang, Pathian fing kim tak, felna i awmtir,
Khawvel thim ata i ram i entir ang;
Tin, lei vela i faten lawmna an hril ang,
Aw Lalpa, inremna min pe ang che.
